settings.title: FAQs

settings.text:
Find answers to our most frequently asked questions below.

If you can't find the answer you're looking for please feel free to drop as email: help@cover-up.com and we'll get back to you as quickly as we can.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
How long will my order take to reach me?
settings.text:
Standard Shipping

Regular post ranges from 3 to 28 working days depending on the shipping country.

For a shipping estimate to your country, please see our Shipping page.

Express Shipping

We offer express shipping to most locations with tracking available. Express shipping is generally 2–3 business days for the USA and UK, and anywhere from 3–5 business days for other countries.

For a shipping estimate to your country, please see our Shipping page.

settings.title: Where do you ship from?
settings.text:
Our USA orders are shipped from our local fulfilment centre in Indianapolis.

Our UK and Rest of the World orders are shipped from our workshop in Wales. (UK)

Please note all items are made to order so please allow 1-2 business days for us to make your order before shipping.

settings.title: What countries do you ship to?
settings.text: ​We ship globally however, there are a few locations around the world we don't ship to. For an update to date list of countries, please see our Shipping page.

settings.title: Can I track my order?
settings.text:
Our Standard Shipping service only offers tracking within the UK or USA as standard. We offer an additonal option to upgrade to a tracked service for other counries.

All Express Shipping orders come with tracking as standard.

settings.title: Will I have to pay customs or import charges?
settings.text:
There are no extra duties or taxes for customers in the UK, USA or the European Union (EU).

Customers in countries outside of these areas may incur extra duties and taxes. Cover-Up will not be responsible for any customs and duties charged to a customer. If you’d like to find out more please email our support team.

settings.title: My shipping address is wrong, how do I update my address?
settings.text:
You can edit the shipping address in your order within the first 24 hours of placing your order by logging into your account or clicking the 'Edit Order' link in your order confirmation email.

To edit your order after this time please email our support team.

settings.title: Returns, Exchanges & Replacements
What is your returns policy?
settings.text:
All our orders are covered by our Happpiness Guarantee.

If you change your mind (it happens to the best of us) or you're not happy with your purchase for any reason, opened or unopened products can be returned for a refund or a store credit for a full 60 days after you order.

There are a few things to note: Customers will need to cover the cost of returning any items to us unless an item is faulty or we have made a mistake with your order. Refunds need to be sent to the original purchaser's method of payment. All items must be returned in original condition.

To make a return you can visit our returns page here.

settings.title: Do I have to pay for returns?
settings.text:
If your item is faulty, defective or we have sent you the wrong order by mistake, we will cover the cost of any returns.

For all other return reason, the customer will pay the cost of the return.

settings.title: I returned my order, how long will it take to get a refund?
settings.text: We aim to process all returns within 2-3 business days of receiving them. The refund will then take around 1 – 3 business days to appear on your statement, depending on your card issuer. For orders paid with PayPal the refund is normally instant.

settings.title: Can I exchange my order?
settings.text: In most cases, yes. Please complete drop our support team an email and we'll do our very best to help you.

settings.title: My order is damaged or defective. Can I get a replacement?
settings.text:
We’re pretty stringent with our quality control, but occasionally something might slip through the cracks. If your product is faulty, or we sent you an incorrect order by mistake, we will normally replace it free of charge or you can send it back to us within 60 days of delivery for a full refund (including shipping).

If you been using your Cover-Up product and it becomes damaged through wear and tear, a drop, water damage or it was removed as part of a repair, then we unfortunately cannot offer a replacement.

settings.title: Orders
What if my order doesn’t arrive?
settings.text: If your order doesn’t arrive within the maximum estimated timeframe we’ll send out a replacement using express shipping wherever it’s available. Simply email our support team with your order details.

settings.title: How do I cancel my order?
settings.text:
As long as we haven't already shipped it, you can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it.

You can do this yourself by clicking the 'Edit / Cancel' order link in your order confirmation email or by emailing our support team.

We may still be able to cancel your order after 24 hours if we haven't shipped it.

Anything after this window will be treated as a regular refund.
